B: ^We have now entered the Production stage. This is the main phase of game development, where the most resources and manpower are invested.
^Building on the core gameplay and flow established during Pre-Production, our team will continuously iterate and expand, creating a large volume of game content and assets.
^The goal by the end of this stage is to have a game that is at or near release quality.
^This stage will be represented by two Sprints.
^Remember? During the last Sprint Review, Sheep said he wanted to see the holiday rewards feature earlier. Now, it’s time to start planning your Sprint Backlog for this Sprint.
